Packages that use ISquare
Package
Description
com.ibm.vie.mazerunner
This package provides the objects and methods needed to interact with the game.
com.ibm.vie.mazerunner.squares
This package contains the different square types used on a board.

    Classes in com.ibm.vie.mazerunner.squares that implement ISquare
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Bushes
    A square full of bushes is moderately difficult to traverse.
    class 
    Lava
    A square full of lava is difficult to traverse.
    class 
    Mountain
    A square full of mountains is difficult to traverse.
    class 
    Mud
    A square full of mud is fairly easy to traverse.
    class 
    Space
    An open square which costs only one step to traverse.
    class 
    Treasure
    A square containing a treasure chest.
    class 
    Trees
    A square full of trees is moderately difficult to traverse.
    class 
    Wall
    An impassible square -- players who traverse into one will lose all their steps.
    class 
    Water
    A square full of water is fairly easy to traverse.
